step.origin: SELECT p.fecha AS fecha, p.nemo AS nombre, 0 AS ajuste, s.valor_base AS precio_de_cierre, 0 AS tir, p.mercado AS mercado, p.grupo AS grupo, p.familia AS familia, p.valorizacion AS valorizacion FROM parametros p LEFT OUTER JOIN sesion_de_mercado s ON p.fecha = '${DATE}' AND s.id_sesion = '${SESSION_ID}' AND p.fecha = s.fecha AND p.nemo = s.nemo AND s.time = 1 WHERE p.fecha = '${DATE}' AND p.mercado = 'DE' AND s.id_sesion = '${SESSION_ID}' AND p.fecha = s.fecha AND p.nemo = s.nemo AND s.tipo_de_escenario = 'HISTORICO' AND s.time = 1
